name: Service Package I (Bronze)
description: One Service visit; includes oil change (customer provides oil & filter), car wash, vacuum, detail, fluid top-off, PSI check.

name: Service Package II (Silver)
description: 5 service visits; includes all Bronze features; save $50 total!

name: Service Package III (Gold)
description: Unlimited oil change + car wash combo for 25-26 PTEC school year (expires May 1, 2026).

name: Desktop Calendar (Multiple Styles)
description: These compact and attractive marble filament calendars are both useful and make a great gift for family, friends, or colleagues!

name: Tea Light Holder
description: Designed and printed at PTEC. When lit, the light shines through, creating cozy and charming patterns for your space!

name: Chess Board
description: This charming board is handmade using hardwood and tile. It is a bold and distinguished centerpiece for any game room or coffee table.

name: Coat / Key Holder
description: These handmade hangars are designed to be both functional and decorative in the home.

name: Lighted Wood Tree
description: Only two remaining! These trees will warm up any home, both indoors and out!

name: Mountain Shelf
description: Celebrate the mountains of Colorado with this strategically designed shelf. It is both decorative and functional.

name: Standing Coat Rack
description: Rugged and reliable. Only one remaining! (Reduced price - was $35)

name: Wooden Stool
description: Great stools for any space in your home or office.

name: Game Console & Controller
description: The perfect portable retro handheld controller - powered by Raspberry Pi Zero W and Adafruit Joy Bonnet! Add ROMS wirelessly, plugs directly into your HDTV!
